thread.title: Jim Cramer -- Wal-Mart (WMT) Pressured by Amazon's (AMZN) Expedited Delivery Service - TheStreet
thread.title_full: Jim Cramer -- Wal-Mart (WMT) Pressured by Amazon's (AMZN) Expedited Delivery Service - TheStreet

author: yahoo
title: Jim Cramer -- Wal-Mart (WMT) Pressured by Amazon's (AMZN) Expedited Delivery Service - TheStreet
text:
Reddit Email Print Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) --  Wal-Mart ( WMT - Get Report )  shares are flat Friday, with investors not reacting much to the company's  announcement it is promoting Executive Vice President Brett Biggs to chief financial officer to replace the retiring Charles Holley at the end of the year. 
The company has struggled, and the stock is down 22% on the year, TheStreet's Jim Cramer, co-manager of the Action Alerts PLUS portfolio , said on Friday's CNBC "Mad Dash" segment. As it is the dividend yield, now close to 3%, is helping support the stock near current levels, he said. 

Wal-Mart  WMT data by YCharts 

Cramer said "there's no question" Amazon ( AMZN - Get Report ) is putting competitive pressure on Wal-Mart , especially now that it is offering prompt delivery, at times even same-day delivery. 
Must Read: Elon Musk's Tesla Gets Dinged Again on Model X Concerns 
Consumers don't want to order online and pick things up in the store, which is part of Wal-Mart's online strategy, Cramer said. Amazon  is as every bit competitive on price as Wal-Mart but makes it so much easier to shop. 
The "order and pickup" strategy doesn't have the traction some investors think, Cramer added. 
At the time of publication, Cramer's Action Alerts PLUS had no position in companies mentioned.
